General.Name: Sadr Logistics Co
General.Description: Sadr Logistics Company manufactures and supplies pallets, racking systems, and shelves for storage and handling solutions in Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Steel, Wood, Logistics, and Other segments. It offers products for storage solutions, such as pallet rack systems, drive in racks, cantilevers, VNA racks, radio shuttle racks, cladding racks, shelves, and mezzanine, as well as accessories; and supermarket solutions, including gondola shelving and shopping carts. The company also provides handling equipment, such as forklifts, hand pallets, roll containers, and conveyors; office solutions comprising mobile shelves, carrousel, and lockers; wooden, plastic, and steel pallets; and warehousing services, including dock levelers, fixed elevators, ramps, firefighting equipment, and epoxy flooring systems. In addition, it manufactures prefabricated steel structure units and furniture; forges, presses, casts, and rolls finished and semi-finished metal products; operates storage facilities; and offers warehousing automation solutions. The company was formerly known as Al Samaani Factory For Metal Industries Company. Sadr Logistics Company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Buraydah, Saudi Arabia.
